article: new york attorney general andrew cuomo said friday he is sending a letter to merrill lynch & co. notifying the investment bank that his office will file suit against it imminently as part of an investigation into the collapse of the auction-rate securities market .
abstract: merrill facing ny lawsuit over securities sale
